string-array.name: tables
string-array.item: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS location ( locationId TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, name TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE COLLATE NOCASE, parent TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, locationType TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, PRIMARY KEY (locationId))
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS locationType ( typeName TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, typeId TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE COLLATE NOCASE, PRIMARY KEY (typeId))
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS centre ( centreId TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE COLLATE NOCASE, name TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, PRIMARY KEY (centreId))
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS vaccine ( vaccineId TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE COLLATE NOCASE, name TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, issupplementary TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, PRIMARY KEY (vaccineId))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS vaccinegap ( vaccineGapTypeId TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, vaccineId TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, gapTimeUnit TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, value TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, PRIMARY KEY (vaccineGapTypeId,vaccineId))
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS vaccinegaptype ( vaccineGapTypeId TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE COLLATE NOCASE, name TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, PRIMARY KEY (vaccineGapTypeId))
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS vaccineprerequisite ( vaccineId TEXT NOT NULL, vaccinePrerequisiteId TEXT NOT NULL, mandatory TEXT DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (vaccineId,vaccinePrerequisiteId))
